Michaelis-Menten

Michaelis-Menten equation.

S=E=ES=P

V=Vmax*S/KM+S.

Therefore when:

S ≫ KM, V=Vmax

S=KM, V= ½ Vmax

S ≪ KM, V=0

Exactly the same maths calculates receptor occupancy, so a dose-response curve is the same shape. I??xxx

Fraction of receptors occupied = [ligand]/([ligand]+K A )

K A = affinity constant.
